rows.label: tev066501_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev066501_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Ni Zinga about Ga Jiarg.

rows.label: tev066501_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev066501_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Ni Zinga if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev066501_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Ni Zinga about the Wrothian kingdom.

rows.label: tev066501_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Ni Zinga if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev066501_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Ni Zinga about recent developments.

rows.label: tev066501_SEL1041
rows.name: Ask Ni Zinga if he's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev066501_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Ni Zinga about recent developments.

rows.label: tev066501_SEL2041
rows.name: Ask Ni Zinga if he's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev066501_MSG0001
rows.name:
Has Prince Jiarg granted you an audience?
Mind your manners if so.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG0002
rows.name:
Our current accommodations may be humble,
but all the same, he is the last of the great Wrothian
royal lineage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG0003
rows.name:
Under normal circumstances, not even we generals
would be allowed to approach him unbidden.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG0008
rows.name:
We can find our own way out of our present
difficulties. We do not want your help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG0012
rows.name:
The Wrothian kingdom was situated in a barren land.
To survive there, my people worked as mercenaries.
It has been this way since times of yore.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG0013
rows.name:
But the Ganglion saw our strength and desired it.
So they threatened our clients until every planet that
had hired our soldiers cut ties with us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG0014
rows.name:
We could not keep ourselves properly equipped.
We were starving. And so, in the end, we groveled
before the Ganglion in pathetic servitude.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG0015
rows.name:
So you see, it was through underhanded cowardice
that my kingdom fell. ...But that was the old kingdom.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG0016
rows.name:
Here in these caves, we have founded a new kingdom!
Like our ancestors before us, we shall send our valiant
warriors to battle in the name of Wroth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG0021
rows.name:
Our mortal enemy, the queen jacul,
must be struck down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG0022
rows.name: But to do this, we will need many soldiers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG0023
rows.name:
I hear that you have claimed a victory over not just
Lady Buidhe, but Prince Jiarg as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG0024
rows.name:
We could use your strength, if you are willing to
share it. I shall tell you more when the time comes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG1001
rows.name:
The monster is finally dead.
My slain friends and departed son can rest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG1002
rows.name:
I thank you, [ST:playername ].
This accomplishment belongs to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG1003
rows.name:
Now, let us strike down our reviled Ganglion enemies
and put the last of our grudges to rest![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG1004
rows.name:
Come, Three Talons! Whet your blades and steel your
hearts! Our final battle draws near![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG1009
rows.name:
In the days of our old kingdom, strong warriors would
gather for a yearly tournament known as the Wrothian
Battle Gauntlet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG1010
rows.name:
I have heard a Wrothian in New LA is trying to
resurrect this tradition here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG1011
rows.name:
You look to be a warrior of not insignificant strength.
Perhaps you should have a run at the Gauntlet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG1012
rows.name:
Ever since hearing of it, the Three Talons have been
yearning to enter and test their might against Mira's
proudest and strongest. Ha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG2001
rows.name:
With our hated enemy destroyed, the Three Talons and
I had renewed our vows to strike the Ganglion down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG2002
rows.name:
But now that task falls to me alone.
And I will not fail![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG2003
rows.name:
Do you hear me, Three Talons?! Watch Ni Zinga from
heaven as he and his men bring this battle to a close![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG2008
rows.name:
In the days of our old kingdom, strong warriors would
gather for a yearly tournament known as the Wrothian
Battle Gauntlet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG2009
rows.name:
I have heard a Wrothian in New LA is trying to
resurrect this tradition here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG2010
rows.name:
You look to be a warrior of not insignificant strength.
Perhaps you should have a run at the Gauntlet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev066501_MSG2011
rows.name:
Were the Three Talons alive, I am sure they would have
entered the Gauntlet themselves and fought to within an
inch of their lives.[ST:wait ]
